faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Do you have a question about our products or service? Below you'll find the most frequently asked questions from our customers.

items.question: Can I fully customise a veranda?
items.answer: Yes. With our configurator you can easily build your veranda based on dimensions, colours, roof type and options such as side walls and lighting. Non-standard sizes are available via custom orders.

items.question: What is the delivery time for a veranda or sandwich panel?
items.answer: The average delivery time is 5–10 working days. For custom or specific finishes, the delivery time may vary slightly. This is always clearly shown with the product.

items.question: Do you also deliver to Belgium and Germany?
items.answer: Yes. We deliver in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany. Delivery within the Netherlands is free. For Belgium and Germany, delivery costs are calculated based on distance.

items.question: Can I assemble the products myself?
items.answer: Yes. Our products are designed for easy self-assembly. You will receive clear assembly instructions. Assembly by our team is optionally available on request.

items.question: Can I view the products in a showroom?
items.answer: Yes. In our showroom you can view various verandas, sandwich panels and finishes. This gives you a good impression of materials, colours and possibilities.

feature.title: Isopar® Plus Lambris: sleek insulated walls.
feature.description1: Isopar® Plus Lambris is an insulated sandwich panel with a sleek lambris finish. It helps reduce heat loss and draughts, giving your wall a neat, clean look right away.
feature.description2: Thanks to the smart profile, you can install quickly and precisely — great for DIY enthusiasts and efficient for professionals. Suitable for veranda and canopy walls, with fast delivery and flexibility in size and finish.

showroom.title: See our verandas and panels in real life.
showroom.description1: In our showroom you'll get a great impression of our verandas, sandwich panels and finishes. You can see and feel the difference in materials, colours and details — very helpful when making the right choice.
showroom.description2: Our specialists are ready to help you think about dimensions, assembly and applications. Whether you're just exploring or already have concrete plans: you're very welcome.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have a question about our verandas, delivery, assembly or a quote? We'd love to help. Our team is ready to respond quickly and think along with you — whether you're a private customer or ordering as a professional.
contact.emailDesc: Always available 24/7 by email for questions, advice or quotes!
contact.phoneDesc: Available by phone from Monday to Friday, 07:30 to 17:00.
contact.whatsappDesc: Also available via WhatsApp for all your questions.
contact.callbackDesc: Would you like advice on our products? Simply schedule a callback. This way we can take all the time to help you personally and answer all your questions.
contact.showroomDesc: Would you like to experience our products in person? Simply schedule an appointment at our showroom. This way we can take all the time to help you personally and answer all your questions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Answers to the most frequently asked questions. Can't find your question? Please don't hesitate to contact us.

1.q: How do I order a veranda from HETT Veranda's?
1.a: You can easily order via our webshop. Choose a standard veranda or build your veranda using the configurator. After completing the configuration, you can order directly or request a quote.

2.q: Can I have a fully custom-made veranda?
2.a: Yes. In addition to our standard sizes, we offer custom verandas. You choose the exact width and depth to the centimetre.

3.q: What is the difference between standard and custom verandas?
3.a: Standard verandas have fixed dimensions and are available faster. Custom verandas are made exactly to your desired size and include a custom surcharge.

4.q: Can I change my order later?
4.a: Changes are possible as long as the order has not yet gone into production. Please contact our customer service as soon as possible.

5.q: Will I receive a confirmation after ordering?
5.a: Yes. After placing your order, you will immediately receive an order confirmation by email with all the details.

6.a: Netherlands: free delivery. Belgium & Germany: delivery costs are calculated based on distance (per kilometre). The exact costs are shown during checkout.

7.q: What is the average delivery time?
7.a: The average delivery time is 5 to 10 working days. For custom or specific configurations, this may vary slightly.

8.q: Will my order be delivered in one go?
8.a: Yes, we deliver your order complete in one delivery, unless otherwise agreed.

9.q: Can I pick up my order?
9.a: Yes, pickup is possible and always free. After ordering, we will contact you to schedule a pickup time.

10.q: Will I be informed in advance about the delivery?
10.a: Yes. You will receive advance notice of the planned delivery date and time window.

11.q: Which payment methods do you accept?
11.a: We accept iDEAL, credit card, Bancontact, Sofort and Shopify Payments, among others.

12.a: Yes. All payments are processed through secure payment environments and comply with applicable security standards.

13.a: Pay-after-delivery is currently not available as standard. For business orders or larger projects, please contact us.

14.q: Are the products suitable for self-assembly?
14.a: Yes. Our verandas and sandwich panels are designed for easy self-assembly. You will receive clear assembly instructions.

15.a: Yes, professional assembly by our team is available on request. Please contact us for this.

16.a: Our products are made from high-quality aluminium, safety glass and durable insulation panels, suitable for long-term outdoor use.

17.a: Yes. Accessories such as LED lighting and profiles can be ordered separately via the webshop.

18.a: Yes. Aluminium and glass require minimal maintenance and are easy to clean.

19.q: What warranty do I get on my veranda?
19.a: We offer a standard 5-year warranty on construction and system, provided it is correctly assembled.

20.a: The warranty covers manufacturing and construction defects. Wear due to improper use or incorrect assembly is not covered.

21.q: How do I submit a service or warranty claim?
21.a: You can easily contact us via our contact page or by email. If possible, include photos and your order number.

22.q: Do you offer support after purchase?
22.a: Yes. Even after your purchase, we are here for questions about assembly, maintenance and use.

23.q: Can I see the products in person?
23.a: Yes. In our showroom you can view various verandas, sandwich panels and finishes.

24.q: Can I get advice when choosing a product?
24.a: Absolutely. Our team is happy to help you choose the right solution for your situation.

25.q: Who are your products suitable for?
25.a: Our products are suitable for both private individuals and professionals, such as contractors and installers.

delivery.title: Delivery & Shipping
delivery.description: Everything about our deliveries, shipping costs and what to expect in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany.
delivery.leadTimesDesc: We aim to deliver in-stock products within 1 to 2 weeks throughout the Netherlands and Belgium.
delivery.costNote: For combined orders (veranda + accessories), veranda rules apply. Delivery to the Wadden Islands is not possible.
delivery.homeDeliveryDesc: Our products are delivered by special transport. Unloading takes place next to the truck ('at the kerb'). Distances are calculated from Eindhoven.
delivery.checkDeliveryDesc: Check the delivery immediately for damages and report this directly to the driver on the consignment note.

warranty.description: We stand behind the quality of our products. Read all about our warranty conditions and complaints procedure here.

mounting.title: Assembly Guides
mounting.description: Step-by-step instructions and videos to professionally assemble your HETT product.
mounting.diyDesc: All our products are designed as smart building kits that you can easily assemble yourself. With our guides and videos, we walk you through the assembly process step by step.
mounting.toolsDesc: Make sure you have these tools before you start:
mounting.supportNote: Our technical service is available for quick questions.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Safe and trusted payments. We offer various payment options for both private and business customers.
payment.intro: At HETT, we value security. That's why we only offer reliable and widely-used payment methods.
payment.idealDesc: The most-used payment method in the Netherlands. Pay safely and quickly through your own bank.
payment.bancontactDesc: For our Belgian customers. Pay easily and securely with Bancontact.
payment.creditCardDesc: We accept VISA, Mastercard and American Express.
payment.klarnaDesc: See first, pay later. Pay afterwards with Klarna.
payment.bankTransferDesc: You transfer the amount manually after receiving the invoice.
payment.onAccountDesc: For registered dealers and regular customers. Available on request.
payment.securePaymentDesc: Our website is secured with an SSL certificate. All payments are processed via certified payment providers.

footer.copyright: © {{year}} HETT Veranda B.V. All rights reserved.

outdoor.title: Always inside, outdoors all year!
outdoor.description: With a HETT veranda, you enjoy your garden four seasons long. Sheltered from rain and wind, yet with the full outdoor feeling, you create an extension of your living room.

custom.title: Custom-made for every garden
custom.description: No garden is the same. That's why we deliver all our systems to the millimetre. Whether it's a standard veranda or a fully custom composition — it always fits.

warranty.title: 10-year warranty on all verandas
warranty.description: We offer a 10-year material warranty on all our verandas. No worries, just enjoy.

service.title: Customer-focused service and transparency
service.description: From honest advice in the showroom to clear communication about delivery — with us you always know where you stand. No fine print.

assembly.title: Easy assembly
assembly.description: Our systems are designed as smart building kits. With clear manuals and videos you can assemble your veranda yourself. And if not? We're happy to help.

about.storyParagraph1: At HETT Veranda everything revolves around one thing: a veranda that's right. Not standard solutions from a catalogue, but a product that perfectly suits your home, your garden and your way of life. We design and produce aluminium verandas built to provide years of enjoyment.
about.storyParagraph2: Whether you choose a standard veranda or a custom composition — everything is delivered with the same care and quality. From the first configuration to final assembly, we guide you every step of the way.

shop.productLoadError: An error occurred while loading the product.
shop.configureDescription: Fully customise your product in our configurator.

delivery.title: Delivery & assembly
delivery.text: We deliver with our own transport throughout the Benelux and Germany. Verandas are delivered free of charge, accessories at a fixed rate.
